frontmatter.title: Big Data
frontmatter.description: Guide for open source big data services on the cloud

internal.content:
---
title: Big Data
description: Guide for open source big data services on the cloud
date: 21 September 2022
---

## Problem

Data is getting larger, more complex, and moving faster (often in real-time). 

### Why is this important for Hybrid Cloud Developers?

## Solution Sketch

* [solution or solution sketche(s)]

(batch data processing with Spark; real-time data processing with Kafka; data catalog)

### Constraints / Limitations

* [limits to approach]

### Key OSS Techs

* [Spark](https://spark.apache.org/)
* [Kafka](https://kafka.apache.org/)
* [Flink](https://flink.apache.org/)

### Example Cloud(s)

* [at least two public clouds as examples]
* [list services and features used for solutions]

| IBM Cloud | GCP | AWS | Azure | Operator |
| - | - | - | - | - |
| [Analytics Engine](https://www.ibm.com/cloud/analytics-engine) | [Dataproc](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/) | [EMR](https://aws.amazon.com/emr/spark/features/) | [HDInsight](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/hdinsight/) | [Spark Operator](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/spark-on-k8s-operator) | 
| [Event Streams](https://www.ibm.com/cloud/event-streams) | [Pub/Sub](https://cloud.google.com/pubsub/) | [MSK](https://aws.amazon.com/msk/) | [Event Hubs](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/event-hubs/) | [Kafka Operator](https://github.com/banzaicloud/koperator) |
|  | [Dataproc](https://cloud.google.com/dataproc/) | | | [Flink Operator](https://github.com/lyft/flinkk8soperator) |
| [SQL Query](https://www.ibm.com/cloud/sql-query) | [BigQuery](https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/) | [Redshift](https://aws.amazon.com/redshift/) | [Synapse Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/synapse-analytics) | n/a |

## Where to Find More?

### Blogs

* [list of related videos and articles]

### Videos

* [list of related videos]

### Tutorials

* [list of related tutorials]

## Problem

### Why is this important for Hybrid Cloud Developers?
